mapper.select: select r.rep_contents,r.rep_id,DATE_FORMAT(r.rep_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date from reply as r inner join novel as n on(n.stitle=r.title) where n.no =#{no} and r.del_yn = 'N' order by r.no desc;
select no from novel where title=#{title} and sort = #{sort};
select sort,id from novel where title = #{title} order by sort desc limit 1;
mapper.update: update category set reg_date=now() where title =#{title}
